column2: "A new Matter Board has been formed. This is a result of following the path you were meant to take."
"From now on, you will see the truth, of both the past and the future."
"But you must not lose your focus. This is an ability that only you possess."
"I and We accept the burden of the responsibility we carry."
"And yet, I and We can do nothing as we watch events develop and unfold."
"That is why I entrust this request to you, and only you."
"You still need not understand. This is something that I and We have decided."
"For now, the only thing I can say is that I would like you to believe me."
